name: interview-prep-qa
description: Backend for managing interview questions and their answers for interview preparation.

resources.name: question
resources.description: An interview question along with its suggested answer.

fields.name: question_text
fields.description: The text of the interview question

fields.name: answer_text
fields.description: The suggested answer to the question

fields.name: category
fields.description: Category of the question (e.g., behavioral, technical, system design)

fields.name: difficulty_level
fields.description: Difficulty level of the question (e.g., easy, medium, hard)
